name: A day in the countryside [SUMMER EDITION]
name_original: A day in the countryside [SUMMER EDITION]
description:
A pleasant and relaxing day in the countryside?

You will play the role of a farmer struggling with the cultivation of his fields... and some funny and spiteful animals.

PC Controls:

  • Left and right arrows - Moving and accelerate
  • Alternatively click and hold on the left or right of the tractor - Moving and accelerate

Mobile Controls:

  • Touch and hold on the left or right of the tractor - Moving and accelerate

This is only the first season, can you provide suggestions in discussion board.

Stay tuned for season updates!

thanks to #devtober 2020
